text: The Belgian First Division A (in the past known as the Belgian First Division and Belgian Pro League, and as the Jupiler Pro League for sponsorship reasons) is a men's football league which is the top division in Belgium. == 2016–17 clubs == * Anderlecht * Brugge * Charleroi * Eupen * Genk * Gent * Kortrijk * Lokeren * Mechelen * Mouscron-Péruwelz * Oostende * Sint-Truidense * Standard
